title: VIDEO: Miss of the season?! Cole Palmer somehow blazes over from point-blank range in dying moments of Chelsea's draw with Leeds
desc: Chelsea talisman Cole Palmer somehow managed to miss a golden chance to score a late winner for the Blues against Leeds on Tuesday in the Premier League. The visitors came back from 2-0 down to secure a point against Liam Rosenior's side, but it could have been a different story if Palmer had managed to find the back of the net in stoppage time at Stamford Bridge.

title: ​AI slop, begone! The viral musical virtuosos bringing brains and brilliance back to social media
desc: Whether making microtonal pop or playing Renaissance instruments with sheep bones, a crop of bold artists are making genuinely strange music go mainstream – but are they at the mercy of the algorithm?

title: President Ruto dismisses claims of meeting al Shabaab
desc: He says his development agenda will not be distracted by politics of division and stereotype.

title: SA Rugby to accelerate women’s coaching pathway
desc: Nine former Springbok Women’s players were included on a list of 24 elite coaches who will form part of SA Rugby’s new Women Coaches’ Transitioning Workshop, a critical initiative designed to bridge the gender gap in elite coaching.

title: Max Verstappen leads opening morning of first pre
desc: The first session of 2026 pre-season testing at the Bahrain International Circuit has seen Max Verstappen top the timesheets.

title: Everton vs Bournemouth Player Ratings: Barry’s missed chances haunt the Blues
desc: Everton’s five-game unbeaten run came to an end against Bournemouth at Hill Dickinson Stadium.

title: Ten dead after shooter opens fire at high school in Canada
desc: Six people were found dead inside a high school, two more people were found dead at a residence that police believe is connected to the incident and another person died on the way to hospital. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: Market-Oriented Disinformation and the Threat of Agentic Disinformation
desc: MEDIA, TECHNOLOGY AND SOCIETY PROGRAMME About the Webinar Informational disorder–misinformation, disinformation and malinformation–is not merely a bug or a byproduct that spreads on digital platforms. It is an intended feature that thrives in the current informational system. Recent phenomena such as identity-driven cultural wars, the trust crisis in the post-truth era and the rise of […]

title: Earth's core could hold enough hydrogen to fill 45 oceans
desc: New research suggests that Earth's core may contain nine times the amount of hydrogen found in all of the planet's oceans, potentially making it the largest hydrogen reservoir.

title: F1 Bahrain pre-season test: Max Verstappen tops opening morning
desc: Max Verstappen was fastest on Wednesday morning as all teams covered a substantial amount of laps
